default.notDisplayedCorrectly: Is this mail not displaying correctly?
default.notDisplayedCorrectlyLink: View this email in your browser

CampaignParticipantInvite.subject: __campaign.organization.name__ Campaign __campaign.title__: Personal Invitation
CampaignParticipantInvite.text:
Dear colleague, dear employee

__campaign.organization.name__ invites you to participate in the company-based health campaign on __campaign.topic.shortDescription__. This web-based health campaign is a service from YOUPERS, a Swiss software company for digital health solutions.

ActivityInvitation.subject: HealthCampaign: Invitation to join an activity from __inviting.fullname__
ActivityInvitation.text: __inviting.fullname__ has invited you to participate in a group activity

ActivityUpdate.subject: HealthCampaign: activity plan update
ActivityUpdate.text: The following activity was planned by __owner.fullname__

ActivityDeleted.subject: HealthCampaign: Activity cancelled
ActivityDeleted.text: The following activity was cancelled by __owner.fullname__

CampaignLeadInvite.subject: HealthCampaign: Invitation to become Campaign Leader from __inviting.fullname__
CampaignLeadInvite.text: __inviting.fullname__ has invited you to become a Campaign Leader for the __campaign.title__ HealthCampaign at __organization.name__. This web-based HealthCampaign is a service from YOUPERS, the Swiss software company for digital health solutions.

OrganizationAdminInvite.subject: HealthCampaign: Invitation to become Service Manager from __inviting.fullname__
OrganizationAdminInvite.text:
__inviting.fullname__ has invited you to become Service Manager for __organization.name__.

To accept this invitation please click on this link:

passwordReset.subject: HealthCampaign: Reset password
passwordReset.text:
It's easy to change your password! Simply click on the link below and follow the instructions.

Thank you!

Your YOUPERS Team

emailVerification.subject: HealthCampaign: Please verify your email address
emailVerification.text:
Thank you for your registration!

You have entered __user.email__ as your contact email address. We want to be sure that this email address belongs to you. Just click on the link below to confirm your email address.

Thank you!

Your YOUPERS Team

new.subject: New Calendar-Entry for: __activity.title__
new.text:
Congratulations! By planning __activity.title__ you have already accomplished an important step!

You can add the events for this activity to your calendar by clicking the link below.

If you do not want to receive further emails like this, you can disable it in your profile.

update.subject: Updated Calendar-Entry for: __activity.title__
update.text:
The plans for __activity.title__ have changed in the meantime. You can use the link below to update your calendar.

If you do not want to receive emails like this in the future, you can disable it in your profile.

cancel.subject: Canceled Calendar-Entry for: __activity.title__
cancel.text:
The calendar entry for activity __activity.title__ has been canceled. You can use the link below to update your calendar.

If you do not want to receive emails like this in the future, you can disable it in your profile.

campaignLeadSummaryMail.salutation:
Hello __user.firstname__

This is your weekly email to your company HealthCampaign on __user.campaign.title__.

section1.text:
Hello __user.firstname__

This is your weekly email to your company-based health campaign on __user.campaign.title__ .

section2.text: If needed, motivate the participants to take active part in the campaign by sending them a message.

section3.browseIdeas: Find an activity in the library
section3.text: I recommend you to invite the campaign participants to a campaign event at least once a week.

section4.text: Recommend an activity to the campaign participants at least once a week (for example, an already existing health promoting activity of your company).

campaignLeadSummaryMail.subject: HealthCampaign " __user.campaign.title__ " - Weekly Mail for the Campaign Leader

1.content:
Hello __user.firstname__

This is the daily summary with all there is to know about your participation in the company-based health campaign on __user.campaign.title__.

In case you have not executed the short self-assessment (about 10 minutes), I recommend you do it now at the beginning of the second campaign week, so that I can provide every day a suitable activity card under "Activity Offer" for you.

You find the self-assessment card on the campaign main page under "Running Activities", if you have not executed or completed it. Click on the map to go to the self-assessment page.

2.content:
Hello __user.firstname__

This is the daily summary with all there is to know about your participation in the company-based health campaign on __user.campaign.title__.

Look at the activity recommendations from the campaign leader and from me to schedule other activities for the second half of the campaign.

Schedule a group activity for example and invite other campaign participants to participate in your group activity.

3.content:
Hello __user.firstname__

This is the daily summary with all there is to know about your participation in the company-based health campaign on __user.campaign.title__.

Carry out health activities in the group is more fun! Therefore, look at the activity recommendations of the campaign leader and the campaign participants and take the opportunity yet to participate in an offered group activity in the last campaign week.

4.content:
Hello __user.firstname__

Today is already the last day of the campaign! Thank you very much for participating in the company-based health campaign on __user.campaign.title__.

Once again, go to the campaign page today and have a look at your personal campaign results. And yet use the opportunity to give us feedback in a short online survey. Thank you very much!

section1.default:
Hello __user.firstname__

This is the daily summary with all there is to know about your participation in the company-based health campaign on __user.campaign.title__.

section2.noEventsToday: You have no activities scheduled for today. Have a look at the new recommendations and invitations.

section3.newCampaignOffers: New recommendations and personal invitations for you
section3.newCommentsOnParticipatedActivities: There are new comments on activities, in which you participate.
